title: Google Pixel 5 not delivering texts in a timely fashion
content:
I got the Pixel 5 several days ago and beyond working out the differences between it and my Galaxy S9 things are working fine with the exception of text.

I am receiving texts many hours after they were sent.  At 3:17pm I received texts from my daughter that had been sent at 7:55 the previous evening.  While I know that this "sometimes" happens, this has been the case with most texts I have received.

To make sure that the problem was not associated with the app I downloaded Textra and the same thing is happening.

This is a non-starter for me as my daughter uses text to let me know that she is ready for our Skype sessions with our grandchildren, so I have to either get this fixed or send the phone back.  I have the same carrier so that has not changed.

Is there some setting I do not know about (quite possible, as I do not know much about these things) or anything I can try to get this working?  I really want to keep this phone but if this does not work then it has to go back.

Thanks -

george
